description:
Merry Christmas!  ‘Tis the time to give---and we are giving you our latest app for free!  Really free.  No cost, no ads.  WhatWord Christmas is for those who like to think, do puzzles, & be festive at the same time.  Unlike most holiday treats, it contains no calories.

WhatWord Christmas is the word find game with a twist—you figure out what words to find (and where, of course.) You choose the puzzle size, level of difficulty and other preferences.  If you get stuck, you can ask for a specific word to find.  To accommodate competitive word searchers, a score is given after each completed puzzle based on the puzzle size, number of words you asked for and your time.  

If you think the puzzles are fun, you can download the original version of WhatWordWhere for $2.  It contains 21 topics, compared to one for this version.  If you don’t enjoy WhatWord Christmas, you can forget about it and go on with your festivities.  We still wish you a happy holiday season.


Note that if the game doesn’t work at all, the app may have been corrupted during the download.  To resolve such an issue, delete it from the device and re-download it from the app catalog.  

++ v1.1.05 fixes problem we discovered on the Pre2 but the fix makes the app more responsive on other devices as well.
